_comments.target_wallet: Solana wallet address to copy trades from (base58 string)
_comments.user_wallet_path: Path to your Solana wallet JSON file
_comments.compute_unit_price: Price per compute unit in micro-lamports (higher = faster execution)
_comments.tip_amount: Optional validator tip in lamports (0 = no tip)
_comments.position_size: Fraction of original trade size to copy (0.1 = 10%, 1.0 = 100%)
_comments.max_retries: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed transactions
